BGGDL-Celicath wins!
Festivals, Estates, and Nobles are all gone.

cards in supply: Adventurer, Ambassador, Baron, Festival, Nobles, Rabble, Spy, Stash, Swindler, and Vault

----------------------

BGGDL-Celicath: 47 points (4 Provinces, 5 Nobles, 10 Estates, and a Duchy); 29 turns
                opening: Ambassador / Baron
                [30 cards] 5 Nobles, 4 Festivals, 2 Barons, 2 Spies, 1 Adventurer, 1 Ambassador, 10 Estates, 1 Duchy, 4 Provinces

trash: a Copper, a Nobles, and an Estate
league game: yes
